APIÂ¶

core.base

This module provides the CalipyProbModel base class that is useful for representing, modifying, analyzing, and optimizing instrument models based on observed data.

core.effects

This module provides the CalipyEffect base class that is used for specifying random and deterministic phenomena affecting measurements and provides a list of basic effects as well as the functionality needed to integrate them into the CalipyProbModel class for simulation and inference.

core.utils

This module provides support functionality related to logging, data organization, preprocessing and other functions not directly related to calipy core domains.
